about_the_game:
Developer's Note:

This game focuses on crafting and character development, featuring a wide range of academic schools, book chapters, equipment, gems (to be introduced later), and rich character attributes. It will have a "grinding" feel to it.

So, players, please consider your personal preferences before purchasing!
So, players, please consider your personal preferences before purchasing!
So, players, please consider your personal preferences before purchasing!

Important things must be said three times :)

"Heroes Of ChunQiu" is a text-based idle game that encompasses a rich variety of academic schools, book chapters, items, and an equipment crafting system. Players can cultivate a single character, gather materials to craft equipment, configure academic schools, and explore book chapters to build their unique hero!

Game Features:

  • Super easy-to-follow gameplay + a complex and diverse skill/item/equipment system!

  • Highly customizable equipment forging system: Combine a plethora of rare and magical affixes. Through reforging, enchanting, and crafting, players can create equipment tailored to their combat style.

  • Enchanting, reforging, and crafting systems allow players to customize adventure gear that fits their tactical needs!

  • A variety of gem socketing options will be introduced in the future!

  • Hidden across 10 major maps, various figures from the Spring and Autumn period await players to defeat in creative ways!

  • Additionally, players can enter the endless battlefield to earn merits, study book chapters, and even elevate their noble rank to enhance their adventurer's abilities!

name: 春秋:英雄(Heroes of ChunQiu)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7 or 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7 or 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or faster processor

short_description: 《春秋：英雄》是一款挂机文字游戏，有着丰富的装备打造系统和单角色养成。在游戏中，你可以享受挂机自动战斗的便利，轻松积累资源，不断提升你的英雄实力。通过收集稀有材料，分解锻造，打造出独一无二的装备。游戏背景设定在春秋时期。《春秋：英雄》不仅适合休闲玩家轻松挂机，也满足深度玩家对策略和养成的追求。
